attributes.action: Penalise recruitment agencies and their agents who advertise non-existent or already filled positions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of man-hours a year are wasted by people applying for positions advertised by recruitment agencies which either don’t exist or have already been filled. 

To this end we suggest that investigations are performed into advertised positions, which are suspect – be that by random spot checks or information gathered from other sources. 

In cases where the recruitment agency or individual agent doesn’t have verifiable proof that the position has been placed with themselves to fill and is still a current requirement, the agency/agent will be fined the maximum salary value of the position advertised, (or the market average if no salary figure stated).
